ygData.msgSnippet: Panzertron took the weapons, after checking them into one of the arms locker, which seemed to be common throu out the ship. We ll start in the engine rooms,

From: Roaklin <roaklin@...>


 Panzertron took the weapons, after checking them into
one of the arms locker, which seemed to be common
throu out the ship.

  "We'll start in the engine rooms," Panzertron
said,"and work our way to the bridge."

-A few minutes later-

 After a ride in a tubrolift, they entered a large
chamber deep in the ship.

  "This is the Main reactor," Panzertron said pointing
at the large machine in the center, "Can produce
enough power to energise a small colony and being of
the latest desigin can run for fifty steller cycles."

  " At this point we are in the deepest bowels of the
Iron Fist," Panzertron said, he had to talk loud as
the engine room was filled with noise," Three layers
of armor protect this area from harm. Past that
bulkhead,"he pointed aft"is the transwarp engines."


  Panzertron's com beeped,"Yes?"

  It was Allitron," Major, just to inform you we have
dropped anchor in our new anchorage. Continue the tour
and then report to the bridge when finished."

 "Yes sir," Panzertron said," Any questions so far? If
not I'll show you one of the main battery fire control rooms."
